title: Topic 005 Question 011
body: During a code review, you discover many quality issues. Many modules contain unused variables and empty catch blocks.
You need to recommend a solution to improve the quality of the code.
options: In a Grunt build task, select Enabled from Control Options.
In a Maven build task, select Run PMD.
In a Xcode build task, select Use xcpretty from Advanced.
In a Gradle build task, select Run Checkstyle.
